sectionHeader.title: What's Said about Me
sectionHeader.description: Don't just take my word for it. See what people that worked with me have to say.

neueTraditionen.recommendation: "I have had the pleasure of working closely with him for three months, and I am confident in his abilities, dedication, passion for teamwork... He was a pivotal member of a three-developer team that successfully built a minimum viable product (MVP) for our company."

organicsBest.recommendation: "Mr. Edward has a high degree of personal initiative, which meant that he regularly made his own concrete suggestions that helped us fully exploit any potential for improvement. In high-pressure situations Mr. Levin always kept a cool head and completed all tasks in time with high quality"

pinkHouseHostel.recommendation: "Ed impressed us with his creativity and understanding of modern web technologies. His work has significantly improved the usability of our platform and led to positive..."
